name: ASA Holdings
overview: ASA Holdings operated as the holding company for Atlantic Southeast Airlines, Inc. (ASA) and ASA Investments, Inc., (ASA Investments). ASA operated as a certificated air carrier providing airline service between Hartsfield Atlanta International Airport in Atlanta, Georgia and 40 other airports in Alabama, Arkansas, Florida, Georgia, Indiana, Kansas, Kentucky, Louisiana, Michigan, Mississippi, New York, North Carolina, Ohio, South Carolina, Tennessee, Virginia, and West Virginia. ASA also operated airline services between Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Dallas, Texas and 21 other airports in Arkansas, Kansas, Louisiana, Mississippi, Oklahoma, and Texas. ASA Investments managed cash assets contributed to it by ASA Holdings and its other subsidiary. As of May 11, 1999, ASA Holdings, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Delta Air Lines Inc.

acquisition.source_description: omnicom group inc acquires asa holdings inc from delta air lines inc
